text: Rue Saint Louis en l'Île is the fifteenth album by experimental French singer Brigitte Fontaine, released in 2004 on the Virgin Records label. It features a new version of Le Nougat from her French corazon album with Mustapha and Hakim Amokrane of French band Zebda, as well as a duet with Areski Belkacem, Le Voile à l'école. There's also a cover of Édith Piaf, L'Homme à la moto, which was present before on an hommage album to the singer, in the words of Fontaine, "just to show off". ==Track listing== ==Charts== {| class="wikitable" !Chart !Peak position |- | France |align="center"|18 |- | Belgium |align="center"|44 |- | Switzerland |align="center"|88 |- |} == References == Category:Brigitte Fontaine albums Category:2004 albums Category:Virgin Records albums
title: Rue Saint Louis en l'Île
